value_claims.claim_title: 60 robots deployed saved 125,000 hours in data migration project
value_claims.claim_description: Dentsu's Automation CoE built and deployed 60 robots in 30 days for a large-scale data extraction and migration project, resulting in savings of more than 125,000 hours.
value_claims.source_quote: the CoE built and deployed an army of 60 robots in just 30 days to complete a large-scale data extraction and migration project, saving more than 125,000 hours.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The robots directly performed the data extraction and migration tasks, with the time savings explicitly attributed to their deployment.

value_claims.claim_title: Media Finance automation reduced report generation from 1 day to 10 minutes
value_claims.claim_description: Media Finance team built StudioX automation for downloading and combining information into formatted Excel reports, reducing process time from one business day to 10 minutes.
value_claims.source_quote: This process took each team member one business day to complete; the attended robot they built completes it in just 10 minutes.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The attended robot directly performs the report generation task, with explicit before/after time comparison showing the robot's impact.

value_claims.claim_title: Media Operations hackathon automations expected to save 850+ hours annually
value_claims.claim_description: Citizen-led automations built during Media Operations hackathon are expected to save the team more than 850 hours of manual effort each year.
value_claims.source_quote: employees built automations that are expected to save the team 850+ hours of manual effort each year
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The automations built by employees directly perform manual tasks, with projected time savings explicitly attributed to these automations.

value_claims.claim_title: Citizen developer hackathons saved over 3,000 hours of manual effort
value_claims.claim_description: Citizen-developed attended automations created during two-day hackathons are estimated to have saved dentsu over 3,000 hours of manual effort.
value_claims.source_quote: Citizen developed attended automations are now estimated to have saved dentsu over 3,000 hours of manual effort just over the course of two-day hackathons.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The citizen-developed automations directly perform manual tasks, with cumulative time savings explicitly attributed to these automations.

value_claims.claim_title: AI copilot reduced media planning time-to-insight by 90%
value_claims.claim_description: Dentsu's predictive analytics copilot built with Azure AI reduced time-to-insight by 90%, turning weeks of manual analysis into minutes of conversational intelligence.
value_claims.source_quote: Dentsu achieved a 90% reduction in time-to-insight, turning weeks of manual analysis into minutes of conversational intelligence.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The AI copilot directly performs the analysis and insight generation, with explicit percentage reduction and before/after comparison attributed to the AI solution.

value_claims.claim_title: Automation enables employees to focus on strategic and creative work
value_claims.claim_description: By automating tedious tasks like timesheet reporting, invoicing, and data manipulation, employees gained more time to focus on strategic client interactions and creative campaign work.
value_claims.source_quote: My automation is only a quick time saver, but this task is going to help tremendously with keeping our entire campaign process on track and providing more time to focus on creative work.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Automation removes tedious tasks, contributing to employees' ability to focus on higher-value work, though the quality of strategic work itself is not directly performed by AI.

value_claims.claim_title: AI copilot democratized access to analytics across teams
value_claims.claim_description: The conversational AI copilot enabled broader teams to self-serve insights without relying on data specialists, democratizing access to advanced analytics through natural language queries.
value_claims.source_quote: The solution also democratised access to analytics, enabling broader teams to self-serve insights without relying on data specialists.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The AI copilot directly provides analytics capabilities to non-technical users through natural language interface, enabling self-service that was previously unavailable.

value_claims.claim_title: Automation improved work-life balance and employee satisfaction
value_claims.claim_description: Dentsu employees reported improvements in work-life balance and found learning automation skills fun, with automation removing drudgery from daily work.
value_claims.source_quote: It's really fun to learn a new skill and figure out the ways to build efficiencies into my day-to-day work.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Automation contributes to improved work-life balance by removing tedious tasks, though the satisfaction itself is a human outcome influenced by multiple factors.

context_claims.claim_title: Dentsu is a global digital marketing communications company
context_claims.claim_description: Dentsu operates in 145 countries with around 45,000 employees, headquartered in London.
context_claims.source_quote: Dentsu is a global digital marketing communications company headquartered in London and operating in 145 countries with around 45,000 employees.

context_claims.claim_description: Dentsu's automation journey started in January 2018 with the creation of its Automation Center of Excellence.
context_claims.source_quote: Dentsu's automation journey began in January of 2018 with the creation of its Automation Center of Excellence (COE)

context_claims.claim_title: Citizen Automation Program piloted in February 2020
context_claims.claim_description: Dentsu piloted its Citizen Automation Program (CAP) with the Media Finance unit in February 2020.
context_claims.source_quote: In February 2020, dentsu piloted CAP with its Media Finance unit.

context_claims.claim_title: Mission to elevate human potential through AI integration
context_claims.claim_description: Dentsu's Automation CoE operates with a mission to 'elevate human potential' by weaving AI into every business process globally, with the ultimate goal of arming all employees with a virtual assistant.
context_claims.source_quote: The ultimate goal is to arm all of our employees with a virtual assistant. There isn't a team or process that can't benefit from AI and RPA.

context_claims.claim_description: Dentsu created an Automation Center of Excellence (CoE) to drive enterprise-wide automation initiatives and govern the citizen automation program.
context_claims.source_quote: Dentsu's automation journey began in January of 2018 with the creation of its Automation Center of Excellence (COE)

context_claims.claim_title: Internal Automation Connective has 500+ members globally
context_claims.claim_description: Dentsu has an internal Automation Connective community with more than 500 members around the world who collaborate and share automations.
context_claims.source_quote: Dentsu has an internal Automation Connective with more than 500 members around the world.

context_claims.claim_description: Dentsu applied automation to finance processes including timesheet reporting, invoice exporting and filing, and financial report preparation.
context_claims.source_quote: Popular citizen-led automations included preparing and manipulating Microsoft Excel reports, exporting and filing invoices, timesheet reporting and email reminders

context_claims.claim_title: Automation applied to media planning and operations
context_claims.claim_description: Dentsu applied AI and automation to media planning workflows, campaign production tracking, and media operations processes.
context_claims.source_quote: In one use case, the automation creates Microsoft Outlook reminders based on a Microsoft Excel campaign production chart.
context_claims.apqc_name: Market and Sell Products and Services

context_claims.claim_title: Operating in media and digital marketing communications sector
context_claims.claim_description: Dentsu operates as one of the world's largest media agencies in the media and digital marketing communications industry.
context_claims.source_quote: Dentsu is a global digital marketing communications company

context_claims.claim_title: Technology partnership with UiPath and Microsoft
context_claims.claim_description: Dentsu partnered with UiPath for RPA and citizen automation capabilities, and with Microsoft for Azure-based AI copilot using Azure OpenAI and Azure AI Foundry.
context_claims.source_quote: Dentsu partnered with Microsoft to build a predictive analytics copilot using Azure Kubernetes Service, Azure OpenAI, and Azure AI Foundry.

context_claims.claim_title: Automation applied to data management processes
context_claims.claim_description: Dentsu applied automation to data extraction, migration, downloading, transforming, and uploading data across systems.
context_claims.source_quote: the CoE built and deployed an army of 60 robots in just 30 days to complete a large-scale data extraction and migration project

context_claims.claim_description: Dentsu implemented a dual approach with enterprise-wide CoE-led automations (top-down) and citizen-led automation program (bottom-up) to maximize automation adoption.
context_claims.source_quote: Introducing citizen-led automation allows us to tackle the automation pipeline from both the top-down and the bottom-up.
